And again, thanks!

>

As is mine

> cold atmosphere.
>

So come see us. Warm house, messy house.

Joylyn

>
> Peggy

messages.subject: Re: Happy Birthday, Joylyn!
messages.msgSnippet: Sorry Joylyn, just got back to town so this is late, Happy Birthday! Just saw a fabulous post on breastfeeding by you on home-ed, you go! And to all the other
messages.messageBody:
Sorry Joylyn, just got back to town so this is late, Happy Birthday!

Just saw a fabulous post on breastfeeding by you on home-ed, you go!

And to all the other August birthdays, Happy Birthday!

Hundreds of messages behind and my house is a total wreck.

Just went to visit some relatives -- very clean house - very creepy - very
cold atmosphere.

Peggy

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Happy Birthdays
messages.msgSnippet: ... I can remember 16 ... it was such a big deal birthday for me, because of getting my driver s license. My first step to freedom! On my 17th birthday, I
messages.messageBody:
--- Nancy Wooton <ikonstitcher@...> wrote:
> on 7/25/02 3:34 AM, SandraDodd@... at
> SandraDodd@... wrote:
>
> > Kirby turns 16 on Monday the 29th.
>
I can remember 16 ... it was such a big deal birthday
for me, because of getting my driver's license. My
first step to freedom! On my 17th birthday, I moved
out on my own. That one was even better!!

I turned 37 last week. My best present was from a
new-ish friend of mine who was surprised I was 37 and
told me I look so young. I'll cherish that while it
lasts!

And I got the gift I wanted from my husband ... a ping
pong table. Not for ping pong ... they make great
cutting tables for sewing projects. He got some of
those adhesive tape measures to put on the edges. I'm
making mattresses for the bunks in our RV right now
and that big old table will come in handy.

Happy birthday all you Cancers-on-the-cusp and Leos!

Shelly

=====
"Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world; indeed, it's the only thing that ever does." -- Margaret Mead

Andrea Kim :-)

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Happy Birthday, Joylyn!
messages.msgSnippet: ... My Laura turns 15 on Saturday, the 27th.  27 should be a lucky number, since my son was born on the 27th of March. Nancy, with a family full of
messages.messageBody:
on 7/25/02 3:34 AM, SandraDodd@... at SandraDodd@... wrote:

> Kirby turns 16 on Monday the 29th.

My Laura turns 15 on Saturday, the 27th. 27 should be a lucky number, since
my son was born on the 27th of March.

Nancy, with a family full of 20-somethings -- 24th (me) 25 (dh and my mom)
27 (aforementioned kids) 29 (sister)


--
I am not moody! I'm like this all the time.
--Laura at 12.

messages.subject: Happy Birthday, Joylyn!
messages.msgSnippet: Happy Birthday, Joylyn! Today/25th is also Ramona King s birthday, another homeschooling mom here (recently of Houston, but living here now). Kirby turns 16 on
messages.messageBody:
Happy Birthday, Joylyn!

Today/25th is also Ramona King's birthday, another homeschooling mom here
(recently of Houston, but living here now).

Kirby turns 16 on Monday the 29th. He's not planning anything special.
There's a staff meeting with food that night where he works. They offered to
let him off for his birthday, but he said no, he'd go to the meeting, so
they're adding a cake.

Sandra
